I like using data to help people **make informed decisions**, **engage audience** with a stronger narrative or simply to **see their world differently**.

Since the beginning of my career in 2013, I've been pursuing opportunities to do just that and have successfully transitioned into increasingly data-centric roles.

What drives me at work and play is the ability to make a difference, and if possible, to do so with as many people as possible. I believe that relationships and teamwork are what make organisations tick, so I enjoy developing code and writing/teaching about code to empower others as I go about this journey.

I spend much of my personal time with my family, learning R/Python3 and the remainder reading the [FT](https://www.ft.com/), [RBloggers](https://www.r-bloggers.com/), [Tidyverse](https://www.tidyverse.org/), [TowardsDataScience](https://towardsdatascience.com/), [TechCrunch](https://techcrunch.com/), [Mothership.sg](https://mothership.sg/).
